titleStmt.title: The Edictus Rothari: a machine readable transcription
titleStmt.author: Unknown

availability.p: Not to ricirculate. Contact the Leges Langobardorum Project researchers for more information.

msIdentifier.repository: Biblioteca e Archivio Capitolare di Vercelli

msContents.textLang: The primary language in this manuscript is Latin, with a few isolated Langobardic words.

extent.measure: The codex is composed by ff. III (paper, modern); 169 (of which 5 where added in the IX c.); II (paper, XIX c.); III (paper, modern).

hyphenation.p: Physical line breaks are rigidly observed.

revisionDesc.change: First add to GitHub repository with minor changes.
